ygData.subject: Re: List meeting / Guild meeting
ygData.msgSnippet: The times are fine. Kelethin is a bit of a problem since my goodie girls are in Qeynos, and my chars in the Western Antonica area would not want to be within
ygData.messageBody:
The times are fine.
Kelethin is a bit of a problem since my "goodie" girls are in Qeynos, and
my chars in the Western Antonica area would not want to be within 20 feet
of a dying Crushbone Orc ;). (without helping the orc of course). Any
relief for the "evil among you"?

I do have a young Cleric I made with my last open slot that I'm toying with
the idea of tagging her with the guild name, as per the suggestion of
communicating via guild chat. However as I wanted her to worship Rodcet
Nife, she started in Qeynos and at 2 would be unable to traverse Highpass
:(. Should I contanct Luna IG to get her tagged for chat though?

- Lora
(still abhors the name with its NPC connection, but loves the idea)
At least 3 of my "bad" girls intend to hunt the NPC sisters ;?
Though the irony of a female character named Deceit with the "Sisterhood of
Erollisi" guild tag hunting the NPC Sisters of Erollisi would be *very*
amusing.

At 10:27 AM 8/7/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
>
>
>
>I only got three votes! I'm hoping that means everyone else was ok with
>all the times. I am nervous setting the time for the meeting based on
>only three votes.
>
>I'm going to wait another couple days to let people vote. If all times
>are ok with you, please send me an email saying that. That will let
>reassure me that people will come 8)
>
>I'll post new times, based on feedback from people who can't attend,
>and the delay of another vote taking. I really hope people will come!
>
>Meeting times:
> - Saturday 14th 10am-12pm PST
> - Monday 16th 6-8pm PST
> - Tuesday 17th 6-8pm PST
>
>I hope these times work out for people. Please send in your vote or
>'all of them are fine' 8)
>
>If you would like to join the guild before that, Luna and Briei (Beth's
>character) are both capable of adding people.
>
>- Christina
>
>---- Original Message
>-----------------------------------------------------------------------
>
>Hi everyone,
>
>As you may recall Suzanne was organizing an online meeting for mailing
>list. We chatted and agreed that Brell Serelis would be a great server to
>have the meeting on. This way we can all meet eachother, and also have a
>subsequent guild event. The subsequent event would be a newbie hunt,
>during which newbies could hunt critters, and higher level guild members
>could help them out.
>
>I'd like to hold a brief vote on the time and place of the meeting on
>brell. The time matters because we all have different schedules. The
>place only matters in terms of where the newbie hunt will take place.
>Please respond to this email if you have a preference (if you don't care,
>you dont need to respond). If any given meeting time is impossible for
>you, please say that, I'll try and minimize those conflicts.
>
>Meeting places:
> - Greater Faydark stone ring (kelethin newbie zone)
> - East Freeport newbie zone
>
>Meeting times:
> - Tuesday August 10th 6pm-8pm PST
> - Thursday August 10th 6pm-8pm PST
> - Saturday August 14th 10am-12pm PST
>
>Vote will be closed friday at 6pm PST and I'll post the results that
>evening.
>
>I'd like to use the guild chat feature to make our meeting easier. Even
>if you're not planning on playing on Brell, you can make a newbie and join
>the guild, to use this feature. It allows us to send tells to our entire
>guild, so we can hear conversation even if we're not exactly in the same
>physical area.
>
>I'd also like to suggest an unofficial guild hunt Saturday August 7th at
>noon PST. The location will be wherever the official one will be held
>(results posted Friday evening). This is for those of us who'd like to
>get into playing together ASAP.
>
>- Christina
>
>
